332640.<pc>のふところにいる\nおとも精霊の イルッピを通して\n隠者パンメッポの声:
Panmeppo's voice came through Spirit Companion
Iruppi at the foot of <pc>.

332641.「ふうむ……。今のところ\n あの魔物の気配は ないようじゃが……。:
Hmmm... So far, there is no sign of the
monster...

332642.「<pc>よ いけるか？\n あやつを 仕留めるのじゃ！！: <pc>, are you ready? Finish him off!

332644.「どうやら 逃げる気のようですね。\n ヒトの足で 追いつくのは\n すこしばか:
It looks like they are trying to escape. It
will be a little difficult for humans to catch
up with them.

332645.「なら オイラが アイツに取りついてやる。\n 絶対に 放さないから <pc>は:
Then I'll attach myself to it. I'll never let
go, so <pc> go after him!

332646.「ウルップだけでは 心配です。\n 私も ともに まいりましょう。:
I'm worried about Uruppu alone. Let me join
you.

332647.「……ふむ。危険ではあるが\n 今は それしか 手がなさそうじゃ。\n 気張るん:
Hmmm... It's dangerous, but it's the only way
to go now. Keep up the fight, you two.

332649.「行っちゃったわね……。\n まあ あのふたりなら 大丈夫でしょ。:
He's gone... Well, I'm sure the two of them
will be fine.

332650.「魔物は 南のほうへ向かったようね。\n すでに ポポリアきのこ山は 出ているは:
Looks like Monster is headed south. Popolia
Mushroom Mountain should be out already. Is it
around Orphea Region East now?

332651.「そこまで 行ってみましょ。\n オルフェア地方東に着いたら だいじなものから\:
Once you get to Orphea Region East, use the
"Spirit Companion" from the Key Items menu.

332652.「あたしが ふたりの気配を たどるわ。\n いそうな方角と だいたいの距離なら\:
I'll follow the signs of the two of you. I can
probably tell you where they are and how far
away they are.

332653.「うむ。あとを追うのじゃ <pc>よ。\n あの魔物に これ以上\n 精霊を食い:
Mm. Follow him, <pc>. We cannot let
that monster devour any more spirits!

332655.「ウルップ！ 魔物が あんたに夢中の\n 今がチャンスよ。今度こそ 逃げられない:
Uruppu! Now's your chance. Monster's crazy
about you. This time, bring him to me so he
can't escape!

332656.「<cs_pchero>様！\n 私とウルップも ともに 戦います。\n あの魔:
<cs_pchero>! Uruppu and I will fight
with you. Let's defeat that monster!

332657.「ほう……。私の精霊獣が 倒されるとは。\n 捕獲能力を 無理に与えた結果\n:
Well... I did not expect my spirit beast to be defeated. It appears that the spirit's inviolability has been diminished as a result
of forcing it to possess the ability to capture.

332658.「私は ブロズ。影に隠れし 隠者を否定し\n 世界を陰から見つめる者 陰者と名乗:
I am Broz. I hide in the shadows, deny
hermitage, and watch the world from the
shadows. Let us hear your name.<yesno><close>

332659.「……名乗らんか。\n ならば それでも かまわん。:
You don't want to tell me your name? Then,
you're welcome to do so.

332661.「なるほど。その精霊どもには\n パンメッポの息が かかっているな。\n やつに:
I see. I see that Pammeppo is breathing down
the necks of these spirits. So, someone who
agrees with him has appeared.

332662.<cs_pchero>の背後から\n隠者パンメッポの声が 聞こえてきた。:
Panmeppo's voice could be heard from behind
<cs_pchero>.

332663.「やはり おぬしのしわざだったのじゃな……。: I knew it was your fault...

332664.「久しいな ブロズよ。\n おぬしと たもとを分かってから\n どれだけの月日が:
It's been a long time, Broz. How long has it
been since you and I have known each other?

332665.「影に隠れて 何も成さず ただ\n 時の流れを見ていることしかできぬ 隠者よ。\:
Hiding in the shadows, I can do nothing but
watch the passage of time, hermit. You seem to
be the same now as you were then.

332666.「それで 今この時も 一歩ずつ\n 破滅へと向かわんとする世界を救えるのか？\n:
Will that save a world that, even at this
moment, is heading toward destruction one step
at a time? The answer is no.

332667.「私は あなたとは違う。\n この世界を 自然を……救う方法を探してきた。:
I'm not like you. I've been looking for a way
to save the world... and nature.

332668.「大地から 緑は失われ 砂にまみれた不毛の地は\n 年々 広がりを見せている。\:
The earth has lost its green, and the barren,
sandy wasteland grows wider every year. Only
the spirits are trying to stop it.

332669.「人々は おろかな争いを くり返し\n 自然と生命を ないがしろにし続けている…:
People continue to neglect nature and life by
engaging in silly conflicts...

332670.「我々 人類こそが 世界を滅ぼす原因なのだ。\n 悪しき原因は 排除せねばならな:
We, the human race, are the cause of the world's destruction. We must eliminate the cause of evil. That is the conclusion I have
reached.

332671.「その答えに たどり着くまでに\n おぬしに 何があったと言うのじゃ？:
What happened to you before you arrived at
that answer?

332672.「別に 何も……。\n 人類に 恨みがあるわけでもない。\n ただ 消すべき存在:
Nothing... I have nothing against humanity. I
just judged them to be beings that should be
extinguished.

332673.「おぬしの答えは まちがっておる。\n わしは 見過ごすことは できんぞ。: Your answer is wrong. I will not overlook it.

332674.「あなたが 私を止めることは 不可能だ。: It is impossible for you to stop me.

332675.「精霊を いじったか。\n おろかなことを！:
You tampered with the genie. What a silly
thing to do!

332677.「隠者よ。影に隠れて 何も成せぬ者と\n 陰に潜みて 事を成す者の違いを教えてや:
O HERMIT. I will show you the difference between those who hide in the shadows and do nothing and those who hide in the shadows and
do great things. Wait for that time.

332679.「……大丈夫じゃ。\n あやつめ わざと 外しおったな。:
It's all right. That bastard missed on
purpose.

332680.「<cs_pchero>よ。\n あやつは 精霊を利用して\n 何事か たくらん:
<cs_pchero>. He seems to be scheming
something using the spirits.

332681.「こちらも 対策を練らねばなるまい。\n わしの家に 戻るぞ。:
We have to take action too. Let's go back to
my house.
